speaker.whotheyare: As head of Instagram, Adam Mosseri leads the engineering, product, and business teams to create experiences that bring people together.
speaker.whylisten:
At Instagram, Adam Mosseri works to shape the experience of the photo-sharing app, combining sharp design thinking with thoughtful product strategy to create an experience all can enjoy.

Mosseri has worked at Meta for more than 13 years, having started as a designer for Facebook's mobile app before moving to product management, where he led the Facebook News Feed product and engineering teams. Previously, he founded a design consultancy focused on graphic, interaction and exhibition design.
